Post.title: amd4700geall in one
Post.subtitle: all in boom
Post._content:
AIO24*7cpuamd4700geuOEM CPUAMD 4700ge 816 TDP 35 6 : MAG B550M MORTAR WIFI 2 * 16G P5 1T 850 UPSSVC BX1450L 4 * 8T(WD80PURX) win10816: ![](win10_cpu.png) ![](win10_memory.png) amd vega radeon ![](win10_radeon.png) cpuz: ![](win10_cpuz.png) cpuz: ![](win10_cpuz_vega_radeon.png) cpu5335300 ![](win10_cpuz_bench.png) ![](win10_standby_power.png) P5 ![](CrystalDiskInfo.png) P5 ![](CrystalDiskMark.png) 8g3000 ![](ludashi_bench.png)
---
biosamdupve ![](pve_dashboard.png) pve7web ![](pve_subscription.png)
## apt update apt upgrade -y apt install curl ufw lm-sensors apt-transport-https ca-certificates htop net-tools ethtool iperf3 vim git fail2ban -y vim /etc/fail2ban/jail.conf, bantime60m fail2ban-client status sshd ## cpu watch -n 2 "cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep MHz" ## cpu apt install cpufrequtils cpufreq-info bash -c 'for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g powersave; done' bash -c 'for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g ondemand; done' bash -c 'for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g performance; done' ## apt install lm-sensors sensors ## bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Weilbyte/PVEDiscordDark/master/PVEDiscordDark.sh ) install ## pvetools https://github.com/ivanhao/pvetools ## ufw apt install ufw ufw status ufw allow 22/tcp ufw enable ufw allow 8006/tcp ufw allow 4000/tcp iptables -L ## swap 32g dd if=/dev/zero of=/swapfile bs=1M count=32768 chown root:root /swapfile chmod 0600 /swapfile mkswap /swapfile swapon /swapfile /etc/fstab/dev/pve/swap/swapfile ## iperf3 pveserver: iperf3 -s -p 4000 pveubuntuclient: iperf3 -p 4000 -c 192.168.2.150 ![](pve_ubuntu_iperf3.png) pve ![](pve_standby_power.jpg) win1020 pvewin10 ![](pve_win10_standby_power.jpg) 3 pvewin10cpuhost ![](pve_win10_cpuz_bench.png) win103% pvewin10IDE ![](pve_IDE.png) ![](pve_win10_ide_bench.png) pvewin10SCSI ![](pve_scsi.png) ![](pve_win10_scsi_bench.png) SCSI SCSIwin10 ![](pve_win10_no_disk.png) ![](pve_win10_scsi_driver.png) ![](pve_win10_scsi_disk.png) [https://pve.proxmox.com/wiki/Pci_passthrough#AMD_CPU](https://pve.proxmox.com/wiki/Pci_passthrough#AMD_CPU) [https://mechanical-consciousness.com/2020/03/20/kvm-gpu-passthrough.html](https://mechanical-consciousness.com/2020/03/20/kvm-gpu-passthrough.html) [https://post.smzdm.com/p/alpwlzvp/ ](https://post.smzdm.com/p/alpwlzvp/ ) win102 ![](before_group.png) 230702.5G93070win10pvePCI 3070172.5G20 ![](after_group.png) AX20019 ![](pve_win10_mine_eth.png) pveopenwrtcpuhost ![](pve_openwrt.png) pvedebianserver: iperf3 -s -p 4000 pveubuntuclient: iperf3 -p 4000 -c 192.168.2.103 ![](pve_debian_ubuntu_iperf3.png) pve2win10 ![](pve_win10_transfer_speed.jpg) ## upsusbwin10-miner ![](pve_win10_ups_usb.png) ![](ups.png) \ \ bashpvevmvmqemu-guest-agent mkdir -p /root/shutdown cd /root/shutdown vim shutdown.sh ``` #!/bin/sh # apt install curl -y ip="192.168.2.x" # ip which will detecting time=30 # interval time of detecting (seconds) triedCount=12 # try count failCount=0 # failed count chat_id="" telegramToken="" path="/root/shutdown/" while true do date=`date +%Y-%m-%d` logfile=$path$date'.log' hostname=hostname echo "Detected hostname: `${hostname}`" >> $logfile notification="curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data-raw '{\"chat_id\":\"$chat_id\",\"text\":\"`$hostname` is shutting down.\"}' -m 10 https://api.telegram.org/bot$telegramToken/sendMessage" # eval $notification now=`date +%Y-%m-%d\ %H:%M:%S` # if ping $ip -4 -c 2 | grep 'time=' > $path'temp.log' if ping $ip -4 -c 2 | grep 'time=' >> $logfile then echo $now 'ping success' $failCount >> $logfile failCount=0 else failCount=`expr $failCount + 1` echo $now 'ping failed' $failCount >> $logfile if test $failCount -ge $triedCount then echo $now 'execute shutdown' >> $logfile eval $notification shutdown -h now fi fi sleep $time done ``` pve30ping192.168.2.x126telegramups vim /etc/rc.loacl ``` #!/bin/bash cd /root/shutdown/ && nohup ./shutdown.sh > /dev/null 2>&1 & #exit 0 ``` chmod +x /etc/rc.loacl reboot

--- title: amd4700geall in one catalog: true date: 2022-03-31 21:25:00 subtitle: all in boom sticky: 999 header-img: /img/header_img/lml_bg.jpg tags: - amd4700ge - AIO - all in one - pve - proxmox categories: - network --- AIO24*7cpuamd4700geuOEM CPUAMD 4700ge 816 TDP 35 6 : MAG B550M MORTAR WIFI 2 * 16G P5 1T 850 UPSSVC BX1450L 4 * 8T(WD80PURX) win10816: ![](win10_cpu.png) ![](win10_memory.png) amd vega radeon ![](win10_radeon.png) cpuz: ![](win10_cpuz.png) cpuz: ![](win10_cpuz_vega_radeon.png) cpu5335300 ![](win10_cpuz_bench.png) ![](win10_standby_power.png) P5 ![](CrystalDiskInfo.png) P5 ![](CrystalDiskMark.png) 8g3000 ![](ludashi_bench.png)
---
biosamdupve ![](pve_dashboard.png) pve7web ![](pve_subscription.png)
## apt update apt upgrade -y apt install curl ufw lm-sensors apt-transport-https ca-certificates htop net-tools ethtool iperf3 vim git fail2ban -y vim /etc/fail2ban/jail.conf, bantime60m fail2ban-client status sshd ## cpu watch -n 2 "cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep MHz" ## cpu apt install cpufrequtils cpufreq-info bash -c 'for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g powersave; done' bash -c 'for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g ondemand; done' bash -c 'for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g performance; done' ## apt install lm-sensors sensors ## bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Weilbyte/PVEDiscordDark/master/PVEDiscordDark.sh ) install ## pvetools https://github.com/ivanhao/pvetools ## ufw apt install ufw ufw status ufw allow 22/tcp ufw enable ufw allow 8006/tcp ufw allow 4000/tcp iptables -L ## swap 32g dd if=/dev/zero of=/swapfile bs=1M count=32768 chown root:root /swapfile chmod 0600 /swapfile mkswap /swapfile swapon /swapfile /etc/fstab/dev/pve/swap/swapfile ## iperf3 pveserver: iperf3 -s -p 4000 pveubuntuclient: iperf3 -p 4000 -c 192.168.2.150 ![](pve_ubuntu_iperf3.png) pve ![](pve_standby_power.jpg) win1020 pvewin10 ![](pve_win10_standby_power.jpg) 3 pvewin10cpuhost ![](pve_win10_cpuz_bench.png) win103% pvewin10IDE ![](pve_IDE.png) ![](pve_win10_ide_bench.png) pvewin10SCSI ![](pve_scsi.png) ![](pve_win10_scsi_bench.png) SCSI SCSIwin10 ![](pve_win10_no_disk.png) ![](pve_win10_scsi_driver.png) ![](pve_win10_scsi_disk.png) [https://pve.proxmox.com/wiki/Pci_passthrough#AMD_CPU](https://pve.proxmox.com/wiki/Pci_passthrough#AMD_CPU) [https://mechanical-consciousness.com/2020/03/20/kvm-gpu-passthrough.html](https://mechanical-consciousness.com/2020/03/20/kvm-gpu-passthrough.html) [https://post.smzdm.com/p/alpwlzvp/ ](https://post.smzdm.com/p/alpwlzvp/ ) win102 ![](before_group.png) 230702.5G93070win10pvePCI 3070172.5G20 ![](after_group.png) AX20019 ![](pve_win10_mine_eth.png) pveopenwrtcpuhost ![](pve_openwrt.png) pvedebianserver: iperf3 -s -p 4000 pveubuntuclient: iperf3 -p 4000 -c 192.168.2.103 ![](pve_debian_ubuntu_iperf3.png) pve2win10 ![](pve_win10_transfer_speed.jpg) ## upsusbwin10-miner ![](pve_win10_ups_usb.png) ![](ups.png) \ \ bashpvevmvmqemu-guest-agent mkdir -p /root/shutdown cd /root/shutdown vim shutdown.sh ``` #!/bin/sh # apt install curl -y ip="192.168.2.x" # ip which will detecting time=30 # interval time of detecting (seconds) triedCount=12 # try count failCount=0 # failed count chat_id="" telegramToken="" path="/root/shutdown/" while true do date=`date +%Y-%m-%d` logfile=$path$date'.log' hostname=hostname echo "Detected hostname: `${hostname}`" >> $logfile notification="curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data-raw '{\"chat_id\":\"$chat_id\",\"text\":\"`$hostname` is shutting down.\"}' -m 10 https://api.telegram.org/bot$telegramToken/sendMessage" # eval $notification now=`date +%Y-%m-%d\ %H:%M:%S` # if ping $ip -4 -c 2 | grep 'time=' > $path'temp.log' if ping $ip -4 -c 2 | grep 'time=' >> $logfile then echo $now 'ping success' $failCount >> $logfile failCount=0 else failCount=`expr $failCount + 1` echo $now 'ping failed' $failCount >> $logfile if test $failCount -ge $triedCount then echo $now 'execute shutdown' >> $logfile eval $notification shutdown -h now fi fi sleep $time done ``` pve30ping192.168.2.x126telegramups vim /etc/rc.loacl ``` #!/bin/bash cd /root/shutdown/ && nohup ./shutdown.sh > /dev/null 2>&1 & #exit 0 ``` chmod +x /etc/rc.loacl reboot

bash -c for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g powersave; done


bash -c for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g ondemand; done


bash -c for ((i=0;i<$(nproc);i++)); do cpufreq-set -c $i -g performance; done

mkswap /swapfile

Post.title: pveopenwrt

Post._content: # img.gzimg ![](upload_img.png) pve7: /var/lib/vz/template/iso ![](pve_img.png) pve6 # vm ios # sshpve : cd /var/lib/vz/template/iso : qm importdisk 100 /var/lib/vz/template/iso/openwrt-2022-03-27-x86-64-generic-squashfs-combined.img local-lvm # ![](pve_openwrt_disk.png) 5G ![](pve_openwrt_disk_increment.png) # cpuvt-dpci ![](pve_openwrt_pci.png) cpuvt-dpveWAN ![](pve_bridge_eth.png) openwrtWAN ![](pve_openwrt_bridge_eth.png) # start at bootYes boot order ![](pve_openwrt_bootOrder.png) qemu guest agentpvevm ![](pve_openwrt_qemu_guest_agent.png) # openwrt pve webssh vim /etc/config/network lanip192.168.2.1 : /etc/init.d/network restart openwrt ![](pve_openwrt_overview.png) diskman5Gext4/optdockeroptoverlay sshdf -Th ![](pve_openwrt_disk_info.png) # cpu ssh: cd /etc && ./coremark.sh /sbin/cpumark: cpumark # opkg install iperf3 server: iperf3 -s -p 4000 client: iperf3 -p 4000 -c 192.168.2.1 ![](pve_openwrt_iperf3.png) n31607800 # ashbash ash opkg update && opkg install bash /etc/passwd root /bin/ash /bin/bash /etc/shells shell /bin/ash /bin/bash /bin/rbash vimopkg install vim bashvim ~/.inputrc "\e[A": history-search-backward "\e[B": history-search-forward set show-all-if-ambiguous on set completion-ignore-case on vim ~/.bashrc HISTSIZE=-1 HISTFILESIZE=-1 alias ll='ls -alhFtr' alias la='ls -A' alias l='ls -CF' source ~/.bashrc # [https://www.betaflare.com/3730.html](https://www.betaflare.com/3730.html) # session vim /etc/config/luci option sessiontime '36000' # qemu guest agent opkg install qemu-ga ![](pve_openwrt_qemu_ga.png) pveopenwrt ip ![](pve_openwrt_ip.png) # pveopenwrt : ethtool -s eth0 speed 1000 duplex full : vim /etc/init.d/network ![](pve_openwrt_eth_full_duplex.png) ![](pve_openwrt_eths_full_duplex.png) # ddns ipv4 804438443 cloudflarednsAip1.1.1.1 openwrtddns ddns .@ ddnscf dns 1.1.1.1 ipping # ssl weblinuxdebiandockernginxacme.sh nginx cd ~/projects/ && mkdir nginx && mkdir nginx/conf.d && mkdir nginx/conf.d/certs docker run --rm -d --name nginx nginx docker cp nginx:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf ~/projects/nginx/nginx.conf docker stop nginx nginx: docker run -d --restart=always --name nginx -v /home/www/projects/nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro -v /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d:/etc/nginx/conf.d:ro --network=host nginx acme.sh curl https://get.acme.sh | sh -s email=yourName@gmail.com exitacme.sh acme.sh export CF_Token="" export CF_Account_ID="" export CF_Zone_ID="" dns[https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/wiki/dnsapi](https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/wiki/dnsapi) Issue cert: acme.sh --issue -d '*.example.com' --dns dns_cf --dnssleep 120 --debug 2 --server letsencrypt Install cert: acme.sh --install-cert -d '*.example.com' --key-file /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.privkey.pem --fullchain-file /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.fullchain.pem --reloadcmd "docker exec -it nginx nginx -s reload" --debug 2 acmessl crontab -l 16 0 * * * "/home/www/.acme.sh"/acme.sh --cron --home "/home/www/.acme.sh" > /home/www/acme.log openwrtvim /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/openwrt.conf ``` server{ listen 80; server_name openwrt.example.com; client_max_body_size 200M; #access_log /data/logs/nginx_json/access.log json; return 301 https://$host$request_uri; } server{ listen 443 ssl; server_name openwrt.example.com; gzip on; gzip_min_length 1k; gzip_buffers 16 64k; gzip_http_version 1.1; gzip_comp_level 3; gzip_types text/plain application/x-javascript application/javascript text/javascript text/css application/xml application/x-httpd-php image/jpeg image/gif image/png; gzip_vary on; client_max_body_size 200M; #access_log /data/logs/nginx_json/access.log json; ssl_certificate /etc/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.fullchain.pem; ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.privkey.pem; ssl_session_timeout 5m; ssl_ciphers ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE:ECDH:AES:HIGH:!NULL:!aNULL:!MD5:!ADH:!RC4; ssl_protocols TLSv1 TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2; ssl_prefer_server_ciphers on; # Prevent crawling if ($http_user_agent ~* "360Spider|JikeSpider|Spider|spider|bot|Bot|2345Explorer|curl|wget|webZIP|qihoobot|Baiduspider|Googlebot|Googlebot-Mobile|Googlebot-Image|Mediapartners-Google|Adsbot-Google|Feedfetcher-Google|Yahoo! Slurp|Yahoo! Slurp China|YoudaoBot|Sosospider|Sogou spider|Sogou web spider|MSNBot|ia_archiver|Tomato Bot|NSPlayer|bingbot"){ return 403; } location / { proxy_read_timeout 60m; proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto https; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade"; proxy_redirect off; proxy_pass http://192.168.2.1:80; } error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html; #location = /50x.html { # root /data/www/error/; #} } ``` nginx: docker ps -a nginx: docker logs -f --tail 500 nginx # > debianip192.168.2.1038443/tcpdebian443/tcp https://openwrt.example.com:8443 openwrt

~/projects/nginx/nginx.conf docker stop nginx nginx: docker run -d --restart=always --name nginx -v /home/www/projects/nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro -v /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d:/etc/nginx/conf.d:ro --network=host nginx acme.sh curl https://get.acme.sh | sh -s email=yourName@gmail.com exitacme.sh acme.sh export CF_Token="" export CF_Account_ID="" export CF_Zone_ID="" dns[https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/wiki/dnsapi](https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/wiki/dnsapi) Issue cert: acme.sh --issue -d '*.example.com' --dns dns_cf --dnssleep 120 --debug 2 --server letsencrypt Install cert: acme.sh --install-cert -d '*.example.com' --key-file /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.privkey.pem --fullchain-file /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.fullchain.pem --reloadcmd "docker exec -it nginx nginx -s reload" --debug 2 acmessl crontab -l 16 0 * * * "/home/www/.acme.sh"/acme.sh --cron --home "/home/www/.acme.sh" > /home/www/acme.log openwrtvim /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/openwrt.conf ``` server{ listen 80; server_name openwrt.example.com; client_max_body_size 200M; #access_log /data/logs/nginx_json/access.log json; return 301 https://$host$request_uri; } server{ listen 443 ssl; server_name openwrt.example.com; gzip on; gzip_min_length 1k; gzip_buffers 16 64k; gzip_http_version 1.1; gzip_comp_level 3; gzip_types text/plain application/x-javascript application/javascript text/javascript text/css application/xml application/x-httpd-php image/jpeg image/gif image/png; gzip_vary on; client_max_body_size 200M; #access_log /data/logs/nginx_json/access.log json; ssl_certificate /etc/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.fullchain.pem; ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.privkey.pem; ssl_session_timeout 5m; ssl_ciphers ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE:ECDH:AES:HIGH:!NULL:!aNULL:!MD5:!ADH:!RC4; ssl_protocols TLSv1 TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2; ssl_prefer_server_ciphers on; # Prevent crawling if ($http_user_agent ~* "360Spider|JikeSpider|Spider|spider|bot|Bot|2345Explorer|curl|wget|webZIP|qihoobot|Baiduspider|Googlebot|Googlebot-Mobile|Googlebot-Image|Mediapartners-Google|Adsbot-Google|Feedfetcher-Google|Yahoo! Slurp|Yahoo! Slurp China|YoudaoBot|Sosospider|Sogou spider|Sogou web spider|MSNBot|ia_archiver|Tomato Bot|NSPlayer|bingbot"){ return 403; } location / { proxy_read_timeout 60m; proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto https; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade"; proxy_redirect off; proxy_pass http://192.168.2.1:80; } error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html; #location = /50x.html { # root /data/www/error/; #} } ``` nginx: docker ps -a nginx: docker logs -f --tail 500 nginx # > debianip192.168.2.1038443/tcpdebian443/tcp https://openwrt.example.com:8443 openwrt

/bin/bash

vimopkg install vim

bashvim ~/.inputrc

\e[B: history-search-forward
set show-all-if-ambiguous on
set completion-ignore-case on

HISTSIZE=-1

alias la=ls -A

weblinuxdebiandockernginxacme.sh

nginx
cd ~/projects/ && mkdir nginx && mkdir nginx/conf.d && mkdir nginx/conf.d/certs
docker run --rm -d --name nginx nginx
docker cp nginx:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf ~/projects/nginx/nginx.conf

nginx:
docker run -d --restart=always --name nginx -v /home/www/projects/nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro -v /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d:/etc/nginx/conf.d:ro --network=host nginx

acme.sh
curl https://get.acme.sh | sh -s email=yourName@gmail.com

exitacme.sh

acme.sh
export CF_Token=
export CF_Account_ID=
export CF_Zone_ID=

dnshttps://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/wiki/dnsapi

Issue cert:

acme.sh --issue -d '*.example.com' --dns dns_cf --dnssleep 120 --debug 2 --server letsencrypt

Install cert:

acme.sh --install-cert -d '*.example.com' --key-file /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.privkey.pem --fullchain-file /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/certs/*.example.com.fullchain.pem --reloadcmd "docker exec -it nginx nginx -s reload" --debug 2

acmessl
crontab -l
16 0 * * * /home/www/.acme.sh/acme.sh --cron --home /home/www/.acme.sh > /home/www/acme.log

openwrtvim /home/www/projects/nginx/conf.d/openwrt.conf

nginx: docker ps -a

nginx: docker logs -f --tail 500 nginx

>

Post.title: wireguard
Post._content:
frpraspberry pisshfrp: ![](frp.png)
vpnipport wireguardIPIPIPddnsddnsopenwrt ![](ddns.png)
docker: home.example.com ``` docker run -d --name=cf-ddns --restart=always -e API_KEY=*** -e ZONE=example.com -e SUBDOMAIN=home oznu/cloudflare-ddns ``` wireguard: ``` docker run -d \ --name=wireguard \ -e WG_HOST=home.example.com \ -e WG_PORT=54321 \ -e PASSWORD=yourPassword \ -e WG_DEFAULT_DNS=192.168.2.1 \ -e TZ=Asia/Shanghai \ -v /path/wg-easy:/etc/wireguard \ -p 54321:51820/udp \ -p 51821:51821/tcp \ --cap-add=NET_ADMIN \ --cap-add=SYS_MODULE \ --sysctl="net.ipv4.conf.all.src_valid_mark=1" \ --sysctl="net.ipv4.ip_forward=1" \ --restart unless-stopped \ weejewel/wg-easy ```
openwrt -> -> -> wgdebianip192.168.2.10354321/udpdebian54321/udp ![](port.png)
wg: [http://192.168.2.103:51821](http://192.168.2.103:51821)peer ![](wg.png)

![](wg_windows.jpg)
ipvpsvps
